channel.title: Jframe error running client? wtf is going on?
channel.description:
when i click run in client i get a Jframe error, how do i fix it?
This is what it says in my run.bat [code]@echo off title EvoScape start javaw -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 EXIT[/code]

item.title: Jframe error running client? wtf is going on?
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

This is my run.bat

@echo off
title DeltaScape
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

See if that helps you.

Althought its probaly your Environment Variables. Youtube has alot of videos.

Read full topic
item.source: Jframe error running client? wtf is going on?
